snippet: The technology reporters and editors of The New York Times scour the Web for important and peculiar items. Friday's selection includes a guide to Facebook gifts, some reservations about changes brought about by social networks and a talk with the...
abstract: The technology reporters and editors of The New York Times scour the Web for important and peculiar items. Friday's selection includes a guide to Facebook gifts, some reservations about changes brought about by social networks and a talk with the woman in charge of Windows 8.

headline.main: Today's Scuttlebot: Facebook Gift Swap and Social 2nd Thoughts
